headline: Show HN: (Couch) Potato Posture Prevention
description:
Like most of you I spend a lot of my time sitting. As I have a hard time keeping an active sitting posture, I decided to spend the afternoon on a small tool/webpage to monitor my posture via the camera and alert me when I'm slacking.

As it seemed to work reasonably, I published it online free to use for anyone.

(FYI it runs fully client-side.)

Enjoy!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: (沙发）马铃薯姿势的预防
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: (沙發）馬鈴薯姿勢的預防

由于它看起来工作合理，我把它发布在网上，免费供任何人使用。

享受吧
